import React, {Component} from 'react' import { API_BASE } from '../constants'; import { Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' class Room extends Component { render() { const { humidity, light, name, pet_access, room_plants, temp_F } = this.props.room return ( {name} Light: {[...Array(light)].map((e, i) => )}
Temperature: {temp_F}Â°F
Humidity: {humidity}%
{pet_access ? "" : "No"} Pet Access {pet_access ? : } {room_plants.length} Room Plants ) } } export default Room
